
Two careless interns reused prime factors in their RSA keys. Intercept the message: ciphertext1: 7720977778816799240221790914203604097159964420196751609887093231726218652282246385732528918662286819857176850505980324702342168621468070110654997270105985, ciphertext2: 660634417307233052974372400143687139532966698184662969381815855795776496353656721834919965580036632998743450597144001038559427837300034624335501968420976 and recover the plaintext using this weakness.


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9857922873527979059074690199271810991256937711600716685080694500333892111621376587015027180850604685593063264630519290757522917250532385095349561110274699, n2=6763570037825290720077265642225899599594789703687515198036774322470261034658696827336077863985031887697327192210687284527194505434326526098596939805241679, e=5480761048487743691028503979169237774217733004886167885061136840162176471330866799289644226810642638967549956118048295740157296312283614100244317426239443

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{vxbh98dx}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 7720977778816799240221790914203604097159964420196751609887093231726218652282246385732528918662286819857176850505980324702342168621468070110654997270105985, ciphertext2: 660634417307233052974372400143687139532966698184662969381815855795776496353656721834919965580036632998743450597144001038559427837300034624335501968420976
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9857922873527979059074690199271810991256937711600716685080694500333892111621376587015027180850604685593063264630519290757522917250532385095349561110274699, n2=6763570037825290720077265642225899599594789703687515198036774322470261034658696827336077863985031887697327192210687284527194505434326526098596939805241679, e=5480761048487743691028503979169237774217733004886167885061136840162176471330866799289644226810642638967549956118048295740157296312283614100244317426239443
extra_info: p=85183542864520364858855325675205125368290261713662492117083680443968365988939, q=115725673551832084377379291167769658281861521924184607479583370770050842843841, r=58444853507773900677612014762898796209128603554220767553505366787969835720719, φ(n1)=9857922873527979059074690199271810991256937711600716685080694500333892111621175677798610828401368450976220289846869138973885070150935718044135541901441920, φ(n2)=6763570037825290720077265642225899599594789703687515198036774322470261034658522656809018257999976896391396523756196294401716100059293437361038919126677120
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
